=== Team Updates ===

* Next week:  quorum or not?  Alpha 1 is week after.

* Starting up SRU and LTS bi-weekly meeting on 11/22
** Agenda: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ReleaseTeam/Meeting/StableReleaseAgenda
** Topics to be discussed:
*** improved test automation for regression and certification
*** lucid LTS status
*** SRU kernel updates
*** SRU package updates

* Launchpad will be opening up o-series and p-series as planning place holders in next month.
** These are for assigning bugs and workitems to (so they don't get lost, and can be revisited in and organized fashion at the start of each cycle).
** Nothing can be uploaded to o-series (or p-series for that matter) until the start of the next release cycle. 
** More communication will be coming out.
